page.title: 10Alton Leisure Facilities
page.content:
Survey of 108 people, all ages on the use made of leisure facilities in the town. Educational evening classes.....1.6% Sports Centre (swimming, judo, gymnastics etc)..................29% Community Centre members..........4% Assembly Rooms(keep fit, dancing).3% Youth Clubs......................10% Music lessons, clubs..............3% Discos,dances at former cinema....7% Other clubs(e.g.model-making).....5% Indoor Sport (snooker, squash at Cromwells club)..................21% Participation in outdoor Sport...30% Watching sport regularly.........36%
41% claim to use none of the leisure facilities available in town.T.V. is their main leisure activity.
